org.carrot2.text.suffixtrees2
Class Edge

java.lang.Object
  org.carrot2.text.suffixtrees2.Edge

public final class Edge
extends java.lang.Object

An edge between two Nodes in a SuffixTree.

Method Summary
 int getEndIndex()
          Returns the ending element index.
 Node getEndNode()
          Returns the end node of this edge.
 int getStartIndex()
          Returns the starting element index.
 Node getStartNode()
          Returns the start node of this edge.
 int length()
          Returns the length of this edge, meaning the number of compressed nodes this edge represents.

getEndIndex

Returns the ending element index.

length

public int length()
Returns the length of this edge, meaning the number of compressed nodes this edge represents. Equals getEndIndex() - getStartIndex() + 1.
